gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 116, Pistons 102
gameRecap.excerpt: Desmond Bane led the Grizzlies with a career-high 49 points (19-31 FG), along with eight assists, and six rebounds as Memphis defeated Detroit, 116-102. Jaren Jackson Jr. added 24 points and four rebounds in the victory. Bojan Bogdanovic led Detroit with 22 points, seven assists, and four rebounds as Jalen Duren added 17 points and 11 rebounds. The Grizzlies improve to 6-14 as the Pistons move to 2-19.
